tatami.simulation

Class SimulationAgent

  • java.lang.Object
    • tatami.core.agent.AgentComponent
      • tatami.core.agent.visualization.VisualizableComponent
        • tatami.simulation.SimulationAgent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, net.xqhs.util.logging.ReportingEntity

    public class SimulationAgent
extends VisualizableComponent
    Agent that handles the simulation.

    It receives one argument, which is a List of XMLTree.XMLNode instances that are read from the scenario timeline and represent events.

    The interface provides buttons for starting, pausing (unimplemented) and exiting the simulation.

    Author:
    Andrei Olaru, Nguyen Thi Thuy Nga
    See Also:
